scoring-system.description: Each scoring system works a bit differently

game-points.description: All players track and accumulate their individual scores from each game. The winner is determined by who has the highest total score at the end of the session. Chaotic, but fun!
game-points.title: Every point counts!

ranked.description: Players receive points based on their final position in each game. In a game with 'n' players, 1st place receives 'n-1' points, 2nd place receives 'n-2' points, and so on, with last place receiving 0 points. For example, in a 4-player game: 1st place gets 3 points, 2nd gets 2, 3rd gets 1, and 4th gets 0.
ranked.title: Score by rank!

scoring-system.title: Scoring system
scoring-system.winner-only: The player who wins the game receives 1 point. All other players receive no points.
